name: Revenge of the Undead Samurai
description:
A long-dead samurai awakens in a burial shrine. The goddess of the underworld, Izanami, informs them that the world has been invaded by demons. As the only warrior capable of defeating the demons, Izanami resurrected the player. However, as their body has been dead for a long time, they have lost much of their power. Izanami tells them that she will revive you as many times as possible - you must defeat the demons at any cost. 

Controls:

WASD - Move the character

Right Arrow - Advance cutscenes

Left click - Sword attack

Right click - Arrow shot

Space - Jump

Shift - Dash

Credits:
